name: 楊元森
objective: 本課程將以C/C++物件、類別、控制敘述、函數、陣列、向量、指標、字串、資料抽象化、控制元超載、繼承、及變形等課題。（學校規定之專業必修課程）
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction to Programming Design
Week 2: Introduction to C++
Week 3-4: Introduction to Classes and Objects
Week 5: Control Statements, Part 1
Week 6: Control Statements, Part 2
Week 7: Functions and an Introduction to Recursion, Part 1
Week 8: Midterm simulation
Week 9: Midterm
Week 10-11: Arrays and Vectors
Week 12: Pointers and Pointer-based Strings
Week 13: Classes: A Deeper Look Part 1
Week 14: Classes: A Deeper Look Part 2
Week 15: Operator Overloading; String and Array objects
Week 16: Brief Introduction to Encapsulation, Inheritance, and Polymorphism
Week 17: Final simulation
Week 18: Final
materials:
書名: C++ How to Program (6th Edition)
作者: P.J. Deitel
ISBN-10: 0136152503
ISBN-13: 978-0136152507
